******** Drawing Specifications *********
Make sure your drawings have dark lines. Photographs are generally not acceptable.
• If your invention is a device or apparatus: Please provide any views of the invention that you feel would be necessary and beneficial in order to understand it.
• If your invention is a system, method or process: Please provide flowcharts or diagrams of the invention. Also include, step-by-step, each function with its name, as well as any functions that send the user to another part of the process, and at what point the method or process should stop.
• If your invention is a chemical combination: Please provide a list of ingredients, including quantities and how to combine the ingredients. You may consider including a molecular structural diagram of the end product. If you are claiming the manner of making the compound, please include a flowchart or diagram of this process as well.
We will continue to process you provisional application for patent upon receipt of your drawings, or upon your approval of the Professional Patent Drawings ordered.
